SCRIPT.MSCRI:
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSTACK.PUB.INCLUDE.ECHO_ON_OFF : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH
!-------------------------------------Logging input parameters------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Compute URL" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_OPS_COMPUTE_URL#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Authentication Token" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_OPS_AUTH_TOKEN#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Tenant Id" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_OPS_TENANT_ID#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Query Parameter" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_OPS_QUERY_PARAM#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
!------------------------------------------ Buidling java arguments -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Building output file path : SET &AGENT_CURR_DIR# = GET_VAR('UC_EX_PATH_TEMP', &AGENT#) : SET &UC4RB_OPS_FILENAME# = "openstack-snapshotlist-&$RUNID#.xml" : PSET &UC4RB_OPS_SNAPSHOTS_XML_PATH# = STR_CAT(&AGENT_CURR_DIR#,&UC4RB_OPS_FILENAME#)
! Action name : SET &UC4RB_OPS_ACTION_NAME# = "LIST_SNAPSHOTS"
! Define java options and values : DEFINE &UC4RB_OPS_OPTIONS#, string, 12
: SET &UC4RB_OPS_OPTIONS#[1] = "-action" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSTACK.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_OPS_ACTION_NAME#" : SET &UC4RB_OPS_OPTIONS#[2] = "&UC4RB_OPS_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_OPS_OPTIONS#[3] = "-computeurl" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSTACK.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_OPS_COMPUTE_URL#" : SET &UC4RB_OPS_OPTIONS#[4] = "&UC4RB_OPS_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_OPS_OPTIONS#[5] = "-tokenid" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSTACK.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_OPS_AUTH_TOKEN#" : SET &UC4RB_OPS_OPTIONS#[6] = "&UC4RB_OPS_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_OPS_OPTIONS#[7] = "-tenantid" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSTACK.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_OPS_TENANT_ID#" : SET &UC4RB_OPS_OPTIONS#[8] = "&UC4RB_OPS_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_OPS_OPTIONS#[9] = "-filepath" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSTACK.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_OPS_SNAPSHOTS_XML_PATH#" : SET &UC4RB_OPS_OPTIONS#[10] = "&UC4RB_OPS_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_OPS_OPTIONS#[11] = "-queryparam" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSTACK.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_OPS_QUERY_PARAM#" : SET &UC4RB_OPS_OPTIONS#[12] = "&UC4RB_OPS_OPTION_VALUE#"
! Build java arguments : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSTACK.PUB.INCLUDE.BUILD_JAVA_ARGUMENTS
! Setting execution environment : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSTACK.PUB.INCLUDE.SET_EXEC_ENVIRONMENT
! Invoking java binary java -jar &UC4RB_OPS_PATH_JAR# &UC4RB_OPS_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#
! Status messages : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** LIST SNAPSHOTS ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** LIST SNAPSHOTS ACTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSTACK.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI: : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSTACK.PUB.INCLUDE.PUBLISH_AUTH_TOKEN :SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE") ! In case of success we publish list snapshot xml :IF &STATUS# EQ 0 : PUBLISH &UC4RB_OPS_SNAPSHOTS_XML_PATH#,,"TOP" ! Publishing total snapshot records found into one AE variable : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSTACK.PUB.INCLUDE.READ_FILE UC4RB_OPS_FILE_PATH = UC4RB_OPS_SNAPSHOTS_XML_PATH :SET &UC4RB_OPS_SNAPSHOTS_COUNT# = 0 :SET &ROOTHND# = XML_OPEN(STRING, &UC4RB_OPS_FILE_CONTENT#) :IF &ROOTHND# <> "" : SET &IMAGES# = XML_GET_FIRST_CHILD(&ROOTHND#) : WHILE &IMAGES# <> "" : IF XML_GET_NODE_NAME(&IMAGES#) = "images" : SET &UC4RB_OPS_SNAPSHOTS_COUNT# = &UC4RB_OPS_SNAPSHOTS_COUNT# + 1 : ENDIF : IF &IMAGES# <> "" : SET &IMAGES# = XML_GET_NEXTSIBLING(&IMAGES#) : ENDIF : ENDWHILE :ENDIF :PUBLISH &UC4RB_OPS_SNAPSHOTS_COUNT# ,,"TOP" :XML_CLOSE :ELSE : PSET &UC4RB_OPS_SNAPSHOTS_XML_PATH# = "" : PSET &UC4RB_OPS_SNAPSHOTS_COUNT# = "" :ENDIF
